entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Raw string literals guide line is shifted when using tabs #64230
  • StackOverflowException when compiling project with large (12MB) cs file and targeting net6.0 #64225
    17.4
  • Ref and in parameters used in ternary vs if statement #64224
  • Consider passing checksum algorithm to TextLoader.LoadTextAndVersion #64220
    17.4
  • Consider obsoleting/internally banning SyntaxTree.Encoding #64219
  • Missing ref safety error inside `foreach` #64218
    17.4
  • IDE0060 is reported incorrectly when parameters has nullable attributes attached #64215
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64213
    17.4

Closed

  • New Stack Trace Explorer only works with English stack traces #62436
    17.4
  • task+closure #64217
  • Convert Type to Record #62623
  • IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a value to => CS0165 Use of unassigned local variable #57650
    17.3
  • Suggestion: some way to suppress IDE0073 on a per-file basis #64208
  • False positive IDE0060 for partial method with SG #57814
    Backlog
  • Switch pattern matching with throwing default returns object with wrong boxed datatype #64196
  • False IDE0059 message #64198
  • XAML: Provide better support for AdditionalFiles analyzers #44131
    Backlog
  • Lack of a fresh Roslyn version in the Mono project #64174
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute class having unsupported type arguments from containing type #58837
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove code that thinks it needs to close a document before removing #64232
    Area-IDE
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Remove editor item from MatchResult #64229
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused TS brace completion code #64226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC: Add a couple of filters to improve diagnosability of crash dumps #64223
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64214
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `foreach` statement. #64209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change)" #64228
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64227
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add multiple language support to stack trace explorer #64204
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64222
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64216
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64212
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit `[module: RefSafetyRules]` attribute only if the module contains type declarations #64201
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a completion list filter for enum member #64054
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip some more tests that are currently failing on debug 32-bit #64207
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64234
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `for` statement. #64154
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE
  • More sync command handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Non positional option for Convert To Record #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers
